|802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.2.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = 1234 |defaultssid = default |defaultssid_regex = ^default$ |default_ch = |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = EW-7415APn |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/03/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 700604245615 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00BRCY41Q |asin_country = US |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "EW-7415APN V1.0A" is silkscreened on the top of the board. :"1244-000000604-01Z" is silkscreened on the bottom of the board. ==Links of Interest== [http://ftp.blackbox.com/anonymous/manuals/W/WAP-300BGN_Manual_2010.pdf Manual] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts====
